value.message: Using console.error for a recoverable API failure; error log level should be reserved for critical failures.
value.suggestion: Use console.warn or console.info for logging recoverable API failures instead of console.error.

value.message: Permissions for updating user profile are controlled solely by userId from client input, risking IDOR vulnerability.
value.suggestion: Verify resource ownership on the backend by checking that the authenticated user is allowed to update the specified userId. Do not rely solely on userId from client input.
